text: Joseph Mazzarino (born June 4, 1968) is an American actor, puppeteer, writer and director. He is best known for his roles on Sesame Street as Murray Monster, Stinky the Stinkweed and other Muppets, and being head writer and director on Sesame Street. He has won 22 Emmy Awards for his work. title: Joey Mazzarino
